reviews.review: good but i don"t think you should have made it free though

Poned un puto anti-cheat en el juego que no os cuesta puto nada y arruinais la experiencia de los que quieren jugar matchmaking. Con o sin prime el online es una mierda. Hay que usar FACE IT u otros metodos para jugar en condiciones a esto.

you have to play this game alot if you want a good trust factor. if you decide to take a break your trust factor will lower and you will face other players with lower trust factors and end up in a horrible match against smurf and cheaters. the ranking system is interesting. when i face silvers they are extremly good at times to the point that they are better than gold nova which confuses me on how that works.
This game is an unbelievable destroyer of time and willpower, guaranteed to rob you of a significant portion of your active cerebral cortex. 10/10 Would recommend
Se queres ser cheater ou apanha-los é neste jogo , mas isso toda a gente ja não e novidade :D caguem mesmo , joguem valorant :D

As you can see, I have put my WAY to much time into this game. At 2609 which is the equivalent of 108 of playing. I started playing 5 years ago, and it was fun, and nothing has changed since 5 years ago. Its buggy, guns are shit, maps are garbage, player base is toxic as fudge, and if you hate yourself this is the game for you. At the end of the day, As much as i hate this garbage game, I've put more hours into it than any other game, and I still love it. Its like a toxic marriage.
faceit has anti-cheat you have nothing you greedy ass bastards get a life and upgrade your fucking anti-cheat
Я не буду вас расписывать свое мнение на огромный пост, просто не играйте в эту игру

Es macht einfach keinen Spaß mehr. Selbst mit Prime ist das Spiel komplett cheaterverseucht!
Lets try Valorant!

Belo jogo, se você gosta de passar raiva, veio ao jogo certo. Quer encontrar gente toxica? E dessa vez senhor jogador de LOL, é todo mundo te xingando com a magia do microfone, com isso você escuta TUDO o que um escroto toxico tem para falar para você. Quer subir de patente? HAHAHAHAHA boa sorte fera. Só os encarnado na sorte cai com um time FODA, e um inimigo fácil. Uma boa sorte! E se divirta nesse mundo de Counter-Strike. Sim sua época de LAN House foi para o lixo, jogue CS:GO, com mais hackers, mais toxicos, mais internet caindo. Mas mesmo assim, amamos esse jogo maldito. E o pior, viciamos. Boa sorte jogador!
